original_title: 水曜日のカンパネラ 日本武道館公演〜八角宇宙〜
overview: It's hard to believe that this is the first video release by Wednesday Campanella (aka suiyoubi no Campanella), known for their high-energy shows that have a good dose of surprise! This Blu-ray is of a live show held at famous venue Nippon Budokan in Tokyo on March 8, 2017. In addition to the full show, about 45 minutes of documentary footage about the concert is included.
title: Wednesday Campanella Nippon Budokan Kouen - Hakkaku Uchuu
